statements: SELECT area_id, area_name, moisture_level, last_updated FROM soil_moisture_levels ORDER BY area_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT area_name, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT area_name, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_levels ORDER BY moisture_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT area_name, last_updated FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, moisture_level, last_updated FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE moisture_level BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY area_id ASC;
SELECT area_id, area_name, last_updated FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE area_name LIKE 'Garden%' ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data
SELECT area_id, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 50
SELECT area_id, timestamp FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM farm_areas WHERE irrigation_required = TRUE
SELECT area_id, location FROM farm_areas ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT area_name, location FROM farm_areas WHERE irrigation_required = TRUE
SELECT area_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM soil_moisture_data GROUP BY area_id HAVING avg_moisture > 0.3

SELECT s.area_id, s.moisture_level, f.area_name FROM soil_moisture_data s JOIN farm_areas f ON s.area_id = f.area_id WHERE s.timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND f.irrigation_required = TRUE ORDER BY s.moisture_level DESC
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS last_updated FROM soil_moisture_data
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_id, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT area_id, MAX(moisture_level) FROM soil_moisture_levels GROUP BY area_id;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_logs WHERE water_amount > 10 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT area_name, min_moisture_level, max_moisture_level FROM farm_areas;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT area_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM soil_moisture_levels GROUP BY area_id HAVING AVG(moisture_level) > 5;
SELECT area_name, max_moisture_level, min_moisture_level FROM farm_areas WHERE max_moisture_level > min_moisture_level;
SELECT area_id, SUM(water_amount) AS total_water FROM irrigation_logs GROUP BY area_id ORDER BY total_water DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_levels WHERE moisture_level BETWEEN 5.0 AND 7.0 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM farm_areas;
SELECT area_name, moisture_level FROM farm_areas WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT area_name FROM farm_areas ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT system_name, area_name FROM irrigation_system JOIN farm_areas ON irrigation_system.area_id = farm_areas.area_id;
SELECT schedule_id, area_id, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule WHERE frequency >= 3;
SELECT * FROM farm_areas;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM farm_areas WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;

SELECT system_name, farm_areas.area_name, moisture_reading FROM farm_areas JOIN irrigation_log ON farm_areas.area_id = irrigation_log.area_id JOIN irrigation_system ON farm_areas.area_id = irrigation_system.area_id;
SELECT area_id, MAX(moisture_reading) AS max_moisture FROM irrigation_log GROUP BY area_id;
SELECT schedule_id, area_id, start_time, end_time FROM irrigation_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM farm_areas;
SELECT area_name, soil_moisture_level FROM farm_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM irrigation_schedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT system_name, installation_date FROM irrigation_system WHERE area_id = 3;
SELECT area_id, MAX(moisture_level) AS max_moisture FROM moisture_readings GROUP BY area_id HAVING max_moisture > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM farm_areas;
SELECT area_name, soil_moisture_level FROM farm_areas WHERE soil_moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT area_id, area_name, MAX(soil_moisture_level) AS max_moisture FROM farm_areas GROUP BY area_id, area_name;
SELECT * FROM moisture_readings WHERE reading_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT irrigation_schedule.schedule_id, irrigation_schedule.start_time, irrigation_schedule.end_time, irrigation_logs.irrigation_amount FROM irrigation_schedule JOIN irrigation_logs ON irrigation_schedule.schedule_id = irrigation_logs.schedule_id;
